name: Dark Awakening War Lock's Curse
description:
Play three different characters, the knight (Sir Xalvador), the archeress (Isabella) and a wizard (William). They must battle War Lock's Curse, he put on the villagers, turning them into zombies, and other creatures that will follow you to your doom. Move through the forest, to the mountains, and into the evil sorcerer's dungeon cave. Put a end to War Lock's Curse, by destroying his sorcerer, before he kills you.

Visit My Youtube Channel, and learn to create games:

 https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC5vauzzvZ_gzqGCUzjfNgMQ

Visit My New Site, MC Game Zone:

 https://mc-game-zone.wixsite.com/mc-game-zone
